actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Financial Services.

official_title: To require the Secretary of Housing and Urban Development to establish a pilot program to provide grants to implementing organizations to administer a whole-home repairs program for eligible homeowners and eligible landlords, and for other purposes.

titles.title: To require the Secretary of Housing and Urban Development to establish a pilot program to provide grants to implementing organizations to administer a whole-home repairs program for eligible homeowners and eligible landlords, and for other purposes.

To require the Secretary of Housing and Urban Development to establish a pilot program to provide grants to implementing organizations to administer a whole-home repairs program for eligible homeowners and eligible landlords, and for other purposes.
